income_messages:
From: l************a@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-20 17:52:49
SUBJECT: Hello,
Hello,
I want to bring to you a notice about present position of your trustee
transaction worth's the sum of $10, 500.000.00 Million USD and all the
efforts I have made to bring it to this final stage. I have been able
to lodged the funds into a secured investment bank here in the United
Arab Emirates, (HSBC Bank ) for onward transfer its into any
designated Bank account of your choice. Kindly get back to me for
further clarification in this regards.
Mr. Richard Jacques Rampal,
Best Regards,
From: l************a@gmail.com
To: yp29743@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-20 19:37:13
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Hello,
My Name is Richard Jacques Rampal.. I got your contact e-mail from the
foreign affairs of United Arab Emirate Dubai.
Anyway, I am very happy about your quick response.
Regarding this on how I contacted you and what do I want you to do, if
this endeavor does not require a foreigner, I don't think I need a
second Party. I can single handily do it alone. I know that you might
be wondering why I have decided to trust you with this huge sum but
the truth is that I need you to pull out this money before our corrupt
government will confiscate it and use it for their selfish interest. I
know also that you will be amazed at the level of trust that I am
willing to place in a person that I have never seen nor spoken.
However, I need your assistance as foreign to join me and pull this
fund ($6.7Million United State Dollars) from this bank where this
funds was deposited to came up for the claim, so I want your
acceptance to assistance me in this transaction. Now, I am assuring
you that this endeavor is 100% safe as long as you will maintain the
absolute confidentiality it requires and follow my instructions
technically.
Based on this, (I WANT TO RECEIVE YOUR TOTAL ACCEPTANCE TO ASSIST ME
CONCLUDE THIS BUSINESS) On the contrary, upon your full acceptance and
devotion in assisting me conclude this transaction, I swear and
promise to do all in my power and reach to make sure that we conclude
this transaction very smoothly and the fund gets transfer into your
receiving bank account in your country. Please Take Note, and keep it
in your mind . I look upon this fortunate opportunity as a
divine intervention from Almighty God/Allah to lift you up and change
your life condition after so many years of long sufferings with your
family as the corrupt government fails to take care of her
responsibilities. Really, this is a financial blessing from Almighty.
All you have to do is to send to me immediately your full details
information where the
funds will be transferred..
 1. Your Full names
2; Your Full Address
3 Occupation
4.Direct Mobile Phone
Remain blessed as i await your reply as soon as you contact with your
full details information.
- Hide quoted text -
I await your urgent reply.
Thanks!
Richard Jacques Rampal
From: l************a@gmail.com
To: yp29743@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-22 03:23:52
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Hello,
How do I explain this transaction to you again?
This transaction is legal and well trusted. And mind you that I have
worked under ground beyond this transaction before i made the contact
to you, so do not entrained any fear?
No any risks of course in this transaction. Now, I am assuring you
that this endeavor is 100% safe as long as you will maintain the
absolute confidentiality it requires and follow my instructions
technically.
All you have to do is to send to me immediately your full details
information to precede this transaction immediate.
Final, as soon as i receive this information i will forward Bank
contact information to you to contact Bank and ask them what you
should do to release the fund of your business partner to your bank
account.
 1. Your Full names
2; Your Full Address
3. Occupation
4. Direct Mobile Phone
Remain blessed as i await your reply as soon as you contact with your
full details information.
I await your urgent reply.
Thanks!
Richard Jacques Rampal
From: l************a@gmail.com
To: yp29743@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-22 18:51:12
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Hello Nathaniel,
How are you doing Today??
Thanks for your response, there is no any potential risks in this
transaction, just like I told you before hundred percentages free and
my plan for this transaction is to use the amount for business
investment in your country no matter the little amount it is. If I may
ask what kind of business do you want us to invest this money wisely
as soon as Bank transfer to your bank account? How capable you are to
handle this transaction???  Again once i receive your answers and your
full details information I will forward bank email address to you to
contact them for the transaction.
Do not entertain any kind of fear?? I have worked underground beyond
this transaction before even made the contact to you. Just do as i
said no risk and it is hundred percent free as you can see okay.
All you have to do is to send to me immediately your full details
information where the funds will be transferred..
1. Your Full names
2; Your Full Address
3 Occupation
4.Direct Mobile Phone
Remain blessed as i await your reply as soon as you contact with your
full details information.
I await your urgent reply.
Thanks!
Richard Jacques Rampal
From: l************a@gmail.com
To: yp29743@m**************p
Time: 2023-02-23 15:13:44
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Hello Nathaniel,
I am in Africa right now Faso for my investment there, my Whats App’s
App Number.
Take my Number and add me: +226 7165 6785.
If you really interesting to do this transaction with me, kindly
contact me again with you’re fully details information to proceed
immediately okay. I have explained all to you. No any risk involved in

This is for Business investment in your country that is purpose.
Regard,
Richard
